mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SHAR_ENPD_RES_SENDER_${year} ( ID, MEDIA_TYPE, OBU_SIGN, TERMINAL_TRANS_NO, OBU_ID, CARD_ID, EN_TIME, VEHICLE_ID, IDENTIFY_VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_TYPE, VEHICLE_CLASS, TAC, TRANS_FEE, TRANS_TYPE, TERMINAL_NO, EN_WEIGHT, EN_AXLE_COUNT, ELECTRICAL_PERCENTAGE, SIGN_STATUS, SPECIAL_TYPE, VEHICLE_SIGN_ID, EN_TOLL_LANE_HEX, PASS_ID, VEHICLE_SIGN, LANE_TYPE, OPERATION_MEDIA ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediaType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{obuSign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalTransNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identifyVehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enAxleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{electricalPercentage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleSignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enTollLaneHex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{laneType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operationMedia,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO TBL_SHAR_ENPD_RES_SENDER_${year} ( ID, MEDIA_TYPE, OBU_SIGN, TERMINAL_TRANS_NO, OBU_ID, CARD_ID, EN_TIME, VEHICLE_ID, IDENTIFY_VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_TYPE, VEHICLE_CLASS, TAC, TRANS_FEE, TRANS_TYPE, TERMINAL_NO, EN_WEIGHT, EN_AXLE_COUNT, ELECTRICAL_PERCENTAGE, SIGN_STATUS, SPECIAL_TYPE, VEHICLE_SIGN_ID, EN_TOLL_LANE_HEX, PASS_ID, VEHICLE_SIGN, LANE_TYPE, OPERATION_MEDIA )
